org.agreement_technologies.service.map_planner

Interface OrderingManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    POPMatrix, POPOrderingManagerMemorization, POPOrderingManagerNoMemorization

    public interface OrderingManager
    Generic methods to be implemented by the ordering manager classes.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addOrdering(int o1, int o2)
      Adds a new ordering between two steps.

      Checks if there is an ordering between two steps.
      void computeAccessibilityMatrix()
      Computes the accessibility matrix.
      int getSize()
      Gets the number of steps in the current plan.
      void newPlan()
      Prepares the manager to store a new plan's orderings.
      void rebuild(POPInternalPlan plan)
      Prepares and updates the manager with a new plan.

      Removes an ordering between two steps.

      Updates the manager with a new plan.

    • Method Detail

      • checkOrdering

        boolean checkOrdering(int i,
                    int j)
        Checks if there is an ordering between two steps.
        Parameters:
        i - First step index
        j - Second step index
        Returns:
        true, if there is an ordering between both steps; false, otherwise
        Since:
        1.0
